author: baranda
msg: Applied patch for  MYFACES-1605 (h:selectBooleanCheckbox h:selectManyCheckbox h:selectManyListbox h:selectManyMenu h:selectOneListbox h:selectOneMenu h:selectOneRadio broken). Thanks to Martin Haimberger

author: awiner
msg: Fix EOL characters to be consistent at least in the component metadata - the license header tool messed this up

author: mturyn
msg: Altered s.t. a header is registered, and some headers and columns have settable horizontal alignments and (in the case of headers) sort-image placement.

author: mturyn
msg: Added header alignment, as well as settable placement of sorting indicator.
To do this, changed the way headers are made so that they're just standard
standard buttons that handle their own settable images (up/down/none), rather
than buttons with subnodes altered by the table..
1.) Fixed bug that was throwing an error under IE.
2.) Worked around bug that was changing the table size on first sort (post a resize)---just
block resizing immediately post the sort.
3.) Made reversed sorting more efficient by using (essentially) a NOT'd sort
function insteadof running the sorter and then reversing the rows.
